ingredients.content: 2 - 3 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only

preparations.content: Place onions, bread, garlic and parsley in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add milk, hake, prawns, salt and pepper then chop <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and chop again <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>. Tip out and form into 4 patties.
Heat a little oil in a frying pan over a medium heat then cook burgers for approx. 5 minutes on each side until golden brown. Serve hot with burger buns and salad if desired.
